system.description:
You manifest a ghostly image of a scythe floating in front of you.

On your turn you can move it up to near distance away and cast touch spells through it. Apply the Necrotic Reap bonus to any spell cast in this way.

Only one instance of this spell may be active at a time.

A second casting of this spell while another instance exists immediately de-activates the previous one, even if the spell fails.
